lender.name: First Central
lender.loan_because: Practiced at closing deals and funding loans in the Ontario area, First Central Mortgage Funding has helped many clients realize their project dreams. First Central Mortgage Funding Inc. uses a combination of industry know-how and reliable, trustworthy connections to bring together the right people for the right projects in Ontario.
lender.occupational_info:
First Central Mortgage Funding gives individualized attention with each project it undertakes. For the Ontario area, First Central Mortgage Funding provides service for a large array of loan needs. First Central Mortgage Funding can fund deals from $20,000 to multiple millions. The professionals at First Central Mortgage Funding Inc. use a large pool of private funds and resources in order to close deals. First Central Mortgage Funding excels at coordination of time and materials that are used to achieve success.
The professionals at First Central Mortgage Funding bring specific masteries to the table. The President and Founder of First Central Mortgage Funding is highly experienced in borrower-lender matching. His team of assets and acquisitions experts, independent and licensed mortgage agents, and market survey managers have done business throughout Ontario. Specializing in bridge loans for short-term financing, refinance loans for a variety of uses, property upgrade renovation loans, and construction loans for businesses, First Central Mortgage Funding Inc. has provided help to business and home owners in the Ontario area. In the past four years, First Central Mortgage Funding has closed over 400 deals. First Central Mortgage Funding can provide many types of loans that suit both the lender and the borrower.
First Central Mortgage Funding does not entertain applications from the mortgager directly; our deals are funded only through licensed mortgage brokers. Please have your broker contact us on your behalf.
First Central Mortgage Funding Inc. has also established the business practice of giving back to the community. Through various charitable efforts, First Central Mortgage Funding has helped organizations that offer assistance to families in need of food, shelter, and clothing. First Central Mortgage Funding has placed a portion of its earnings in these community organizations, from Toronto to other places in the Ontario area. First Central Mortgage Funding uses its business success to help others in the community.

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: Everybody deserves a break.

lender.name: The Dhar Group

lender.name: Linda

lender.occupational_info: As a trial lawyer, it is my job to help people who have been hurt recover fair and just compensation for their injuries from those responsible for causing them.

lender.name: Bonnie
lender.loan_because: I believe we are here to help each other. I'm not rich or famous so maybe I can't make huge contributions, but thru Kiva I'm happy to be able to help real people realize their goals. I makes me feel good to share the blessings that I've been lucky enough to receive....
lender.occupational_info: I teach people to make others feel beautiful. My students learn to do facials and makeup, which makes the customer not only look pretty, but feel good about themselves as well. It's wonderful to help people learn!

lender.name: Kathryn
lender.loan_because: I think that the Kiva model is win-win, can't lose. The lender dollars do good, come back, and go out to do good again. Powerful!
lender.occupational_info: I help single adults find loving partners using Internet dating sites.

lender.name: Shaun Lindbergh
lender.loan_because: Because I can! I think Kiva is a magic way for ordinary people like me to make a difference on a global level. Just awesome!
lender.occupational_info: I am a business activist who is passionate about inspiring and empowering people to achieve their dreams. I have been involved with various forms of social development since the late 1970's.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: I have no idea, it just feels good I suppose.
lender.occupational_info: I'm learning how to make movies.

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: I believe in personal empowerment and helping others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a Holocaust Museum and Library at Chapman University. We are involved in various educational programs including an annual Holocaust Art & Writing Contest for middle and high school students, a lecture series, and Yom Hashoah (Holocaust Remembrance).

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: It's important to help people who are less fortunate and many of these entrepreneurs depend on our micro loans to subsist.

lender.name: ADAM
lender.loan_because: I loan because it feels good to be able to give someone across the world an opportunity to be more successful in their life. I also really like the flowing cyclical nature of the lending where the money comes back and I can re-lend it so I get to make loans over and over with the same money. It's great to be able to make a large impact based on such a small contribution.

lender.name: Ian Samuel
lender.loan_because: The boy immediately picked up a starfish and threw it back into the ocean. And then he did the same for the next nearest starfish, and the next nearest after that; continuing until he had tossed almost all of the starfish in his vicinity back into the water. The father admonished the boy that he could not possibly save all of the starfish on the beach. The boy tossed one more starfish back into the sea, turned to his father and said simply, maybe not, but it saved that one.

lender.name: Danny Sauter
lender.occupation: College Student. President of EDUN LIVE On Campus.
lender.loan_because: each loan is a step to empower individuals and communities around the world. and that, is awesome.

lender.name: frye
lender.loan_because: slots, free casino slots, free slots
lender.occupational_info: The thing is that if you try this you will never want to try something else because free slots are the best!

lender.name: BulkReefSupply.com
lender.loan_because: Kiva makes it very easy to make a meaningful difference in the world. Plus, its a loan so our initial investment can continually benefit other people once the loans are repaid. Kiva is also the most transparent charity we have found and the only charity we know of where you can revolutionize someones life or even a whole community with a $25 loan and then once it is paid back help a whole new series of people with the same money or even withdraw the entire loan without it ever costing you a dime.
lender.occupational_info: We sell affordable salt water aquarium supplies to reefers who appreciate quality, value and solid customer service.

lender.name: Minou
lender.loan_because: It is everyone's responsibility to care, give and share
lender.occupational_info: I am an entrepreneur at heart - involved in financial literacy/education for children & youth - www.mindtreasures.com

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I too am a small business owner, and understand the trials and tribulations that occur every day while owning and operating a retail business. To find and use an avenue for financial help without all the red tape is a wonderful thing!
lender.occupational_info: We run a small family owned and operated sign and sports graphics company in Independence, Missouri, USA

lender.name: Lauralee
lender.loan_because: I believe that together we can change the world from the inside out. It's going to happen in community with others and it's up to you and I to make a difference.

lender.occupational_info: I keep development in line with government regulations.

lender.name: Terri
lender.loan_because:
My favorite quote is -- "do what you can, with what you have, where you are." That philosophy led me to Kiva.
Growing up in a working class family, I know first-hand the roadblocks for the working poor. I also know how much a helping hand can mean at a critical moment.
I can't afford to make huge donations nor am I in a position to volunteer on a full-time basis. But through organizations like Kiva, I am trying to "do what I can, with what I have, where I am."

lender.name: LeaRae
lender.occupation: Nurse Entrepreneur Network Director and coach
lender.loan_because: I know how blassed I am to have options and resources. There are entrepreneurs in other countries that could do some much and gain independence if they only had a small amount of help.
lender.occupational_info:
I have a subscription website that help nurses start and grow their own businesses. As a nurse myself I learned that I could be in control of my work life and enhance the amount I could earn by becoming a nurse entrepreneur. I wanted to be dependent on myself and not on a health care organization to determine my future. I have a website and a blog to help other nurses so they don't have to figure it out all on their own.
I also have a website and blog for cabin owners and those dreaming about being cabin owners.

lender.name: Erik
lender.loan_because: This is a new and fun way to help other people.
lender.occupational_info: I work logistic issues for the U.S military.

lender.name: Coleen
lender.occupational_info: I am an optician that focuses on the patient to help in every aspect of life. From work and everyday to playing the sports they love, I can find the best fit and ensure that the best options are picked in order to provide the best visual acuity.

lender.name: Rufo Ben
lender.loan_because: Want to start a small/medium scale dairy cattle farm
lender.occupational_info: Starting in 2002 I began growing sweet peppers organically. i enjoy working in the field that's why the field produces quality product. yet, market price in my locality is low making no profit after every harvest. So I am planning to borrow for an additional capital for my shifting to dairy farming.

lender.occupational_info: Helping transport the elderly and disable to and from their medical appointments. The world have forgot the ones in need and I'm going to be the one to help them in their time of need.

lender.name: Peanut - the Kiva dog!
lender.loan_because: I believe that we all can make a positive difference in this world. I pray that my contributons facilitate good works and encourage others to do the same.
lender.occupational_info: No day is the same! I'm a really good at sleeping, eating snacks, barking at strangers, licking strangers, growling when I don't want you to move me from my owner's lap, and oh did I mention eating snacks? I saved up quite a few snack bones to make this contribution, so please consider doing the same! Please consider donating money to my site so that I can provide more opportunities to people in need. Chow now...

lender.occupational_info: I design products to be sold in stores across the United States.

lender.loan_because: I have worked with a microfinance organization in Kenya and seen first hand the difference that these loans make in a community.
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently a student trying to figure out the most effective way I can play a roll in changing the world for the better.

lender.name: Jimmy Nguyen
lender.loan_because: to support the entrepreneurial spirit. More importantly, this is one of the best ways to empower others by giving them opportunities to become economically independent, improve their standard of living, and alleviate poverty for themselves and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: Founded Easy Tennis, a tennis lesson and coaching business dedicated to make learning tennis easy for both adults and youth.

lender.loan_because: I want YOU to be successful.

Hello! Hooligans have broken my camera and now I am compelled to earn additionally the loader, the courier and the handyman. To do qualitative photos this all that I be able. It is necessary for me $1200 for purchase of the new camera.

lender.name: Kara
lender.loan_because: Give, and it will be given to you. A good measure, pressed down, shaken together and running over, will be poured into your lap. For with the measure you use, it will be measured to you.

lender.name: Bonnie
lender.loan_because: I thank my daughter for giving me this gift and I thank Kiva for giving me the opportunity to give effectively to such worthy causes.

lender.name: Brooke
lender.loan_because: I want to help the world change...for the better.

lender.name: Audrey

lender.name: Carmen & Cesar
lender.loan_because: why not?

lender.name: Gregory
lender.loan_because: I want to encourage and make possible emergence from poverty through self achievement.
lender.occupational_info: I am working toward a better future and I would like to encourage all to do the same.

lender.name: Steve and Sarah
lender.loan_because: We think it is a wonderful way to open doors of opportunity. It seems that small, local businesses are the heart of a local economy- and this is a way to encourage growth and sustainability...
lender.occupational_info: Design structures to withstand hurricanes, earthquakes, and heavy loads.

lender.name: Visual Posters
lender.loan_because: It's nice to care about things outside your own little bubble.
lender.occupational_info: We print music posters for bands, musicians and record labels.

lender.name: Angela
lender.occupation: husband loves to cook, would love to help him

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I loan because I am the person whom relates to people from all walks of life not only in my job but in life, I began my company with pennies in my pocket and a passion for success. When you have a dream no matter what the obstacles you should keep trying to make that dream come true.
lender.occupational_info:
Owner/CEO John Ramirez
Many elements can make food a pleasurable discovery rather than simply something to eat. At Angels Catering, we dedicate ourselves to produce the highest quality and most innovative items for your event. Not only are we providing our clients with delicious food but a creative expression that will heighten the joy of your guests.
Precise and exceptional. These are words that come as second nature to our dedicated staff. Our staff takes great pride in the individual effort of providing service that brings a worry free smile to you.
Our goal at Angels catering is simple,
To provide unparalleled service to our customers, community, and service industry with high standards for our quality food. We pay diligent attention to every detail and always provide an immaculate environment. Our goal is to continue to raise the standards for excellence each and every day in the catering business. Excellent Food, Excellent Service, Excellent Value! Angels catering strives to bring you a quality presentation of tantalizing food at a reasonable price. Select from our wide array of menu items or add some of your own. We are willing to work with you so you get exactly what you want.
Various Catering Styles Dinners Luncheons Breakfasts Picnics Barbeques Buffets Banquets Formal Dinners Children's Parties
Delicious Catered Cuisine Spanish, Mediterranean, American and Southern Cuisine with a Creole Flair Individual Menu Planning Platters Hors d Oeuvres Healthy Vegetarian Dishes
Any Special Occasion Weddings Showers Anniversaries Fundraisers Promotional Events Class Reunions Corporate Parties Funerals Grand Openings Business Outings Business Meetings / Seminars Theme Parties Cocktail Parties
Special Services Wedding Consultants
Location: On or Off-site Catering Will Travel (Call for Details) Fashion Shows Delivered to Your Office In Your Home
We are known for our outstanding food and menu creations. All menu items are prepared to order and made from the freshest ingredients. This is a family run business and our repertoire of well-tried recipes are an accumulation of generational contributions.
Service and Staffing is another aspect of our full service catering company. We take a great deal of pride in being able to provide our customers with the most professional and courteous selection of servers, bartenders, and delivery people. Displaying and serving of food is very important to us. We are continually updating our complete line of buffet equipment to insure that our customers have the best presentation available. We have a menu for every budget! Please call us for any further information.
( References are always available )

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: Responsibly administered microcredit improves both individual lives and the world as a whole.
lender.occupational_info: I am the co-founder of XE.com, the world's most popular currency and foreign exchange website.

lender.name: Shankar
lender.loan_because: equal opportunity is a myth
lender.occupational_info: hospital doctor in the making

lender.name: Preston
lender.loan_because: Because we're not a people who fear the future, we're a people who make it.
lender.occupational_info: I help make sure people's computers continue to work all day.

lender.name: Rance
lender.loan_because: I am blessed, and want to bless others. In my travels, I have come to believe that outright aid creates dependency. The Kiva model helps people help themselves out of poverty. If I loan to 10 people, and 2 don't repay...so what? I've helped 8 people RADICALLY change their life! Keeping money in the system is incredible....when someone pays you back, re-lend it to someone else in need. I love seeing people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Husband, father, and friend who dabbles in the financial services field.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: In helping others, we help ourselves. Microfinance is a way of engaging in sustainable philanthropy and social responsibility.
lender.occupational_info: I work in fundraising for a university and help raise money for scholarships, faculty and building campaigns.

lender.name: WLC Kiva Project
lender.loan_because: The Walter L Cohen HS Kiva Project is a student based philanthropy group. The students are required to conduct research on individual Kiva Entrepreneurs and then develop a persuasive presentation for the class. The students then act as a committee evaluating the different presentations before choosing one to provide funding for.
lender.occupational_info: The purpose of this project is to promote the real world application of economic and geographic knowledge as well as communication, business, and team work skills.

lender.name: Sirpa
lender.loan_because: This is a good way to help someone in person.

lender.name: Kenneth
lender.loan_because: I want to help as I have been helped
lender.occupational_info: Having suffered the pains of PARENTAL ALIENATION SYNDROME and seeing first hand the incredible destruction is causes in the lives of all involved,, I pray for my chlidren and the children of others who have experienced and are experiencing what should be considered one of the greatest crimes against humanity, the evil act of one parent taking away the right of a child to love both their parents, sometimes the illness of the offending parent is just too great and the ALIENATION can steal away the entire childhood years from the other parent, it is my dream and goal to end PARENTAL ALIENATION SYNDROME as soon as possible for each family,, We use the Internet daily it is a very powerful medium,, we must use it for GOOD for the BETTERMENT of our kind the Human Race,,so it's with that heart,,I use the proceeds from my business to further my life's passion which is creating a forum where Parents and Children who are seperated because of PARENTAL ALIENATION SYNDROME can find one another and never be seperated again.... To spread the word of the exisitence of such a program that the whole world will use it and one day put an end to the hideous machine that is the FAMILY COURT SYSTEM, through love and support and a sense of doing what is right,, we can prevent children from ever being separated from both their parents :) or sadly we can atleast reunite adult children with their other parent before its too late and PARENTAL ALIENATION SYNDROME strikes its final blow, which is the parent and child never get back together again,, please help me get the word out, to breathe life into FATHERS LOST AND FOUND, I have used every dime of my money and my business is now suffering as a result of PAS and my efforts to combat it,, Thank you for your time and now if nothing else you too know about the crime of PAS please pass along the website even if you can't lend "We should teach Children how to love not who to love" myspace.com/fatherslostandfound

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I am a combat wounded and disabled Viet Nam Veteran. I served with ARVN forces and I speak Vietnamese. I also have several Vietnamese friends in the US.

lender.name: Michael and Dorothy
lender.loan_because: this loan is actually in honor of my parents' birthdays (happy birthday mama and pops!) They loan because it is a way to live out their shared commitment to others. And because they are just the BEST!

lender.name: Sydney
lender.occupational_info: I sell wine in a small shop in Louisiana.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.occupation: instructional designer / hybrid or online courses
lender.loan_because: giving small amounts lifts people worldwide, empowers individuals, changes lives, extension of the imicrocredit idea, in which very small loans (microloans) are made to those in poverty designed to spur entrepreneurship.
lender.occupational_info: Nancy is working as an eLearning Specialist at the University of Arizona. Nancy is also currently working on teaching-learning applications related to Second Life (SL), Social Networking (Facebook), and Mobile Computing (iPhone, iPod Touch, Kindle, Nook, iPad), and the D2L CMS.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I think it's important to give people the opportunity to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I help make sure that terrorists and other criminals don't have access to the US banking system.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: Because I am able
lender.occupational_info: Retired Military working for FedEx and going to school in the evenings.

lender.name: Terri Lynn
lender.occupation: oh, how I wish I knew...
lender.loan_because: I loan in memory of my beloved,generous hearted and greatly missed son Michael.
lender.occupational_info: I am a wife, mother, teacher, artist and seeker of new and interesting ideas.

lender.name: pat anderson
lender.occupation: Host of nationally syndicated radio show, A Fitnes
lender.loan_because: I want to help improve people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I motivate people to take better care of themselves.

lender.name: Dan Brenner
lender.loan_because: Love. And because I can. And I don't expect to be paid back. My belief is that education and economic stability are the cornerstones of peace. And to quote Nick Lowe: "What's so funny 'bout peace, love and understanding."
lender.occupational_info: I try my best to help people struggling with mental illness, or difficulty in their lives of any kind. I use psychotherapy, psychoanalysis, and medications when they're helpful.

lender.name: Jo~
lender.loan_because: As a self employed person, I understand the motivation and energy it takes to be successful and this is one way to empower individuals to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: My work is to design and build gardens for people to enjoy. Mother earth is our sustenance and our provider. We should take good care of her and in the process be a witness to the beauty around us. I use organic methods and teach others how to care for our planet through gardening.

lender.name: Pramod
lender.loan_because: if my one loan can help anyone to become economically independent...i will feel satisfied

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: of karma!
